metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12652 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: libpng before 1.6.32 does not properly check the length of chunks against the user limit.

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '73.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
libpng1.6 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.37-1').
thunderbird package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:68.5.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
